description:
Add Admin Badge Navigation Shortcut

Add a visible admin badge/button in the application UI that allows administrators to quickly access the admin panel without manually typing the URL.

Requirements:
- Display an admin badge only to users with admin privileges
- Badge should be easily accessible from the main navigation or header
- Clicking the badge navigates directly to the admin panel
- Badge should be visually distinct but not intrusive to the UI
- Verify admin permission check before rendering the badge
- Ensure badge appears consistently across all pages (or specify where it should appear)
- Consider adding an icon or label that clearly indicates admin functionality

Edge cases to consider:
- Handle users who lose admin privileges while logged in
- Ensure badge doesn't appear to non-admin users even temporarily
- Test behavior when admin panel URL changes
title: Add admin quick-access badge to navigation
